caption: Relating to prohibiting the investment of state money in certain countries and in certain private business entities in those countries.
summary: The bill prohibits Texas state investments in companies from "countries of concern" including China, Iran, North Korea, and Russia. Companies owned/controlled by these countries or their citizens will be scrutinized. Chinese companies and companies with majority Chinese ownership/control will be required to change their structure within 90 days or face divestment of state funds. This could significantly impact Chinese businesses and investments in Texas.
translation: 该法案禁止德克萨斯州在"关注国家"（包括中国、伊朗、朝鲜和俄罗斯）的公司中进行投资。由这些国家或其公民拥有/控制的公司将受到审查。中国公司和中国人占多数所有权/控制权的公司将被要求在90天内改变其结构，否则将面临州政府资金撤资。这可能会对在德克萨斯州的中国企业和投资产生重大影响。
committees:
1. House Committee on State Affairs
2. House Committee on Investments Financial Services
3. House Committee on International Relations Economic Development
